languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, прямо по курсу — флагман "Благословение Друза" с небольшим сопровождением. Они запрашивают прямой вокс-канал. Сейчас открою вам доступ..."

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, прямо по курсу — флагман "Благословение Друза" с небольшим сопровождением. Они запрашивают прямой вокс-канал с гололитной проекцией. Сейчас открою вам доступ..."

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, прямо по курсу — флагман "Благословение Друза" с небольшим сопровождением. Они запрашивают прямой вокс-канал. Сейчас открою вам доступ..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."
"Lord Captain, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."
"Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、すぐ前方に、旗艦ドルススの祝福号と小型護衛船を発見。直接のヴォクス通信を求めています。今繋ぎます…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、すぐ前方に、旗艦ドルススの祝福号と小型護衛船を発見。直接のヴォクス通信を求めています。今繋ぎます…」

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on a le vaisseau amiral la Bénédiction de Drusus et une petite escorte droit devant nous. Ils demandent l'ouverture d'un canal-vox direct. Je vous connecte... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on a le vaisseau amiral la Bénédiction de Drusus et une petite escorte droit devant nous. Ils demandent l'ouverture d'un canal-vox direct. Je vous connecte... »

languages.text: “船长老大，我们遇到了旗舰‘德鲁苏斯赐福号’与它的小型护卫舰队。对方要求与我们直接通话，正在为您接通……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们遇到了旗舰‘德鲁苏斯赐福号’与它的小型护卫舰队。对方要求与我们直接通话，正在为您接通……”

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, wir haben direkt vor uns das Flaggschiff Drusus' Blessing mit einer kleinen Eskorte. Sie wollen einen direkten Vox-Kanal. Stelle durch ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, wir haben direkt vor uns das Flaggschiff Drusus' Blessing mit einer kleinen Eskorte. Sie wollen einen direkten Vox-Kanal. Stelle durch ..."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos al buque insignia, la Bendición de Drusus, con una pequeña escolta justo enfrente. Solicitan un canal de voco directo. Le conecto...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, tenemos al buque insignia, la Bendición de Drusus, con una pequeña escolta justo enfrente. Solicitan un canal de voco directo. Le conecto...».

languages.text: "Sancak gemisi Drusus'un Nimeti, yanında küçük bir refakatçi gurubuyla ileride Lord Kaptan. Doğrudan bir voks kanalı talep ediyorlar. Bağlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, we have the flagship Drusus's Blessing with a small escort dead ahead. They are requesting a direct vox-channel. Patching you through..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, ana gemi Drusus'un Nimeti, yanında küçük bir refakatçi gurubuyla ileride. Doğrudan bir voks kanalı talep ediyorlar. Bağlıyorum."
